top_comments.comment: You make south africans proud man #octagon best store on the hermitcraft server

1) switch lever to off
2) go into hopper to check if first inventory slot is empty
3)break comparator and face it to the observer
4) flick the lever to activate update suppression
5) look into hopper and use number key to put into your inventory slot
6) turn off update suppression and look back to the hopper

Hope you see this Ren, love your vids!

Turn system on

If people continue paying in the shulker box (and I think it's a problem that will continue, even if people get the message they will make mistakes from time to time), I think there are ways you could remedy the situation with redstone:

Basically, if a shulker box has been emptied below a certain threshold, have the system wait a while and then break the box and replace it. That way if a shulker box contains only diamonds or derpcoins, the comparator won't read it as empty, but it'll read it as mostly empty.

Then when the shulker box is collected by the system, dispense it again, empty it out into sorted storage, and re-fill it with the item you're selling, and put it back into the system. (Or just keep the box as-is if you want to see what people were putting in there)

You could also give shoppers the ability to trigger this manually: "Push button to restock", something like that.
